tossup_question: -   –  What experiment famously used interferometry to search for differences in the speed of light as the earth travelled around the sun?
bonus_question: -   –  You are standing along the principal axis of a large concave mirror, staring at the vertex 30 feet away. The image point of the mirror is 20 feet in front of you. If you are six feet tall, how tall, in feet, is your image in the mirror?
